lead_paragraph: The players’ union said in a letter that N.F.L. Commissioner Roger Goodell cannot hear Brady’s appeal because he will be called as a witness.

headline.print_headline: Suspension of Brady May Face Court Fight
headline.main: Union and Tom Brady’s Lawyers Threaten to Challenge Suspension in Court

snippet: The players’ union said in a letter that N.F.L. Commissioner Roger Goodell cannot hear Brady’s appeal because he will be called as a witness.
abstract: NFL Players Association demands that NFL Commissioner Roger Goodell recuse himself as arbitrator in New England Patriots quarterback Tom Brady's appeal of four-game suspension.
